title: Move In Special! Internet Ready, Off Street Parking, Cats Allowed
posting_body: ['Aldrich Avenue Apartments', '2310 Aldrich Ave S, Minneapolis, MN, 55405', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Welcome Home to Aldrich Avenue Apartments', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath', 'Welcome to 2310 Aldrich Apartments in the heart of The Lowry Hill East Neighborhood commonly known as The Wedge.', 'The Wedge neighborhood is a hub for mass transit options, including the Bryant Ave Bicycling Boulevard, the Greenway that runs along the southern border, and the Uptown transit hub.', 'This neighborhood is also a corridor for local small businesses catering to the neighborhood residents that is sure to please your urban lifestyle.', 'Walkability to businesses, schools, the lakes, grocery stores (including the iconic Wedge Co-op, which was started in this neighborhood), medical and veterinary services, restaurants, art institutions, and nightlife is its biggest value while being an exciting and dynamic neighborhood that is progressive in urban living.', 'Your apartment home at Aldrich Apartments includes options for generous Studio, 1BR, and 2BR homes that are updated with distinguished features like beautiful mosaic ceramic tiles, updated appliances with electric flat top ranges, hardwood floors and designer carpeting.', 'Baseboard heat and air conditioning, and off street parking – all included with rent!', 'Your favorite furry friend (cat) is also welcome to help you enjoy your new home.', 'Aldrich has all of the necessities that will make you feel comfortable making this popular and desired location your home.', 'Features', '- Refrigerator', '- Air Conditioning', '- High-speed Internet Ready', '- Cable TV Ready', 'Community Amenities', '- Security: Controlled Access', '- Security: Intercom', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Off Street Parking', '- Cats Allowed', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats only with additional deposit', '5XyZheUMM']
